content: Very simple import structure. With either but not both of the last of four imports all is good, but with both of them, this error. One of the imports doesn't import anything and the other imports only Mathlib.Data.Real.Basic. Anyone recognize the problem right off the bat? The full import is Mathlib.Data.Real.Basic.

Eric Wieser said:

Can you make a #mwe?

You may fork this repo: https://github.com/kevinsullivan/cs2120f24.git
You are redeclaring the mentioned notation that already exists in Mathlib. Try putting it in a namespace.

Sebastian Ullrich said:

You are redeclaring the mentioned notation that already exists in Mathlib. Try putting it in a namespace.

Ay yaiyai. Thx.
While we're at it, is it possible to have this exact comment as the error message?
